articles.author: Rinku Ghosh
articles.title: Why almonds should be your go-to snack: Study says they help you lose weight faster and protect your heart - The Indian Express
articles.description: Australian study shows that including almonds in an energy-restricted diet helped people lose weight by 7 kg. That’s because good fats have highest satiety, pace up metabolism and encourage body fat burns, say nutritionists
articles.content: How many times have you reached out to all kinds of nuts but not almonds as a snack, thinking that the latter have high fat, albeit they have the unsaturated or the good fat? Now new research from th… [+3371 chars]
